Table.Name: mgcBrightSpec
Table.Description: Combination of extraction parameters that are unique to MGC_BRIGHT and the MGC redshift catalogue

Column.Name: SDSS_N
Column.Description: Number of SDSS objects matched to MGC object

Column.Name: SDSS_RA
Column.Description: SDSS object right ascension in deg (J2000)

Column.Name: SDSS_EXTINC_U
Column.Description: SDSS Galactic extinction correction in mag

Column.Name: SDSS_EXTINC_G
Column.Description: SDSS Galactic extinction correction in mag

Column.Name: SDSS_EXTINC_R
Column.Description: SDSS Galactic extinction correction in mag

Column.Name: SDSS_EXTINC_I
Column.Description: SDSS Galactic extinction correction in mag

Column.Name: SDSS_EXTINC_Z
Column.Description: SDSS Galactic extinction correction in mag

Column.Name: SDSS_PETR50_U
Column.Description: SDSS radius containing 50% Petrosian flux in arcsec

Column.Name: SDSS_PETR50_G
Column.Description: SDSS radius containing 50% Petrosian flux in arcsec

Column.Name: SDSS_PETR50_R
Column.Description: SDSS radius containing 50% Petrosian flux in arcsec

Column.Name: SDSS_PETR50_I
Column.Description: SDSS radius containing 50% Petrosian flux in arcsec

Column.Name: SDSS_PETR50_Z
Column.Description: SDSS radius containing 50% Petrosian flux in arcsec

Column.Name: TDFGRS_N
Column.Description: Number of 2dFGRS objects/spectra for this MGC object

Column.Name: TQZ_NOBS
Column.Description: Number of 2QZ spectra for this MGC object

Column.Name: NED_N
Column.Description: Number of NED objects matched to this MGC object

Column.Name: NED_RA
Column.Description: NED object right ascension in deg (J2000)

Column.Name: PF_RA
Column.Description: PFr object right ascension in deg (J2000)

Column.Name: LSBG_RA
Column.Description: LSBG object right ascension in deg (J2000)

Column.Name: LSBG_MUCEN
Column.Description: LSBG central surface brightness in mag/arcsec^2

Column.Name: ZSOURCE
Column.Description: Identifier for best redshift and quality

Column.Name: N_SPEC
Column.Description: Total number of spectra for this object

Table.Name: mgcDetection
Table.Description: Table of main extraction parameters for all sources in MGC_BRIGHT and MGC_FAINT http://www.eso.org/~jliske/mgc

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Table.Name: mgcGalaxyStruct
Table.Description: Galaxy absolute and structural parameters for 10095 B<20 galaxies in the MGC measured using GIM2D (Simard et al. 2002, ApJS, 142,

Column.Name: MGC_SPEC_TYPE
Column.Description: Best spectral type fit from Poggianti (1998)sample (type+age, i.e., el150 = E/S0 15.0Gyrs)

Column.Name: MGC_BEST_ZQUAL
Column.Description: Quality of best redshift (0-2 = BAD, 3-5=GOOD, 9=Not observed)

Column.Name: absMagPt_u
Column.Description: SDSS u Absolute PET mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPt_B
Column.Description: MGC B Absolute KRON mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPt_g
Column.Description: SDSS g Absolute PET mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPt_r
Column.Description: SDSS r Absolute PET mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPt_i
Column.Description: SDSS i Absolute PET mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPt_z
Column.Description: SDSS z Absolute PET mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_u
Column.Description: SDSS u Absolute PET SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_B
Column.Description: MGC B Absolute KRON SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_g
Column.Description: SDSS g Absolute PET SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_r
Column.Description: SDSS r Absolute PET SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_i
Column.Description: SDSS i Absolute PET SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_SB_z
Column.Description: SDSS z Absolute PET SB, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPsf_u
Column.Description: SDSS u Absolute PSF mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPsf_g
Column.Description: SDSS g Absolute PSF mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPsf_r
Column.Description: SDSS r Absolute PSF mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPsf_i
Column.Description: SDSS i Absolute PSF mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: absMagPsf_z
Column.Description: SDSS z Absolute PSF mag, dust K & E-corrected

Column.Name: D_MODULUS
Column.Description: B proper distance to the object (h=1)

Column.Name: SERSIC
Column.Description: Sersic Index (=4 for de Vaucouleurs profile)

Column.Name: ABS_MAG_GIM2DB
Column.Description: GIM2D B Absolute mag, dust and K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_MAG_GIM2DD
Column.Description: GIM2D B Absolute Bulge mag, dust and K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_MAG_GIM2D
Column.Description: GIM2D B Absolute Disk mag, dust and K & E-corrected

Column.Name: ABS_CSB_BULGE
Column.Description: Absolute Central Surface Brightness of Bulge

Column.Name: ABS_ESB_BULGE
Column.Description: Absolute Effective Surface Brightness of Bulge

Column.Name: ABS_CSB_DISK
Column.Description: Absolute Central Surface Brightness of Disk

Column.Name: ABS_ESB_DISK
Column.Description: Absolute Effective Surface Brightness of Disk

Column.Name: BBDWEIGHTERR
Column.Description: Error in weight from MGC4 BBD
